title: 190: Herodotus IV: Cambyses "The Passable"
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: In this installment of Thomas's series on the Landmark Herodotus, we talk about the reign of Cambyses, who gave bad gifts, had bad spies, and couldn't pull back a fancy bow. He was cranky about it.
itunes:author: If we say our names we'll probs be killed
itunes:subtitle: the "We Graded on a Curve"
